title: Instant Feedback System down?
body:
I'm curious... Is the instant feedback system down? It appears that some incredibly toxic players which I normally get ban popups for aren't producing popups. Even with them saying really really toxic things about self harm. 

Are the report feedbacks just not being sent to players?

replies.body: I just left a discussion about the instant feedback system lol. There is a mute button you should learn to use. Don't let people tilt by saying those things. Mute and move on.

To my knowledge, everything is still working as usual! It might just be taking a little longer for us to work through those reports, but rest assured knowing we're still on the job!
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
